topic: Live updates: Australia face India in third T20, scores and commentary

ideas.title: Yarra River Wickets
ideas.premise: A tourist punts down the Yarra, oblivious to the T20 game on the big screen, declaring 'That's gone for six!', accidentally dislodging a submerged shopping trolley, celebrating like they took a wicket.
ideas.why_funny: Australian humour: Yarra River's reputation, tourist's cluelessness, cricket analogy.

ideas.title: BBQ Banter Breakdown
ideas.premise: Two blokes at a Melbourne BBQ argue passionately over the cricket commentary, completely ignoring the burning snags.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable Aussie BBQ scene, prioritizing cricket over food, classic banter.

ideas.title: Melbourne Weather Woes
ideas.premise: The MCG is shown under a deluge of rain, with players huddled under tiny umbrellas and a frustrated commentator exclaiming 'And the weather's decided to bowl a maiden over!'.
ideas.why_funny: Melbourne weather is notoriously unpredictable, combined with cricket jargon.

ideas.title: Tram Tracker Triumph
ideas.premise: A frustrated commuter checks their TramTracker app, only for the arrival time to be delayed because 'Due to extreme cricket excitement, driver is pausing to watch a crucial over'.
ideas.why_funny: Highlights Melbourne public transport frustrations and prioritisation of cricket.

ideas.title: Shane Warne's Ghostly Analysis
ideas.premise: Shane Warne's ghost provides overly specific commentary from the heavens: 'That needed a bit more wrist...and maybe a kebab from Stalactites'.
ideas.why_funny: Referencing a Melbourne icon (Warne) and a famous Greek restaurant.

headlines.title: Live updates: Australia face India in third T20, scores and commentary
headlines.summary: Following a dominant win in Melbourne, Australia can take a massive step towards winning the T20 series against India with a victory in Hobart. Check
